name: define-configurable
description: Defines new (or modifies existing) properties (using Object.defineProperty, setting `configurable: true` by default

scripts.test: NODE_ENV=test node test | tap-difflet && vtest test | tap-difflet && standard
scripts.travis: npm run cover -s && istanbul report lcov && ((cat coverage/lcov.info | coveralls) || exit 0)

author: Vigour.io <dev@vigour.io>
